mapper.select: SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users (user_name, user_email, user_password, user_fullname, user_avatar) VALUES (#{userName}, #{userEmail}, #{userPassword}, #{userFullname}, #{userAvatar})
mapper.update: UPDATE users SET user_name = #{userName}, user_email = #{userEmail}, user_fullname = #{userFullname}, user_avatar = #{userAvatar}, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE user_id = #{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT user_name, user_id, user_email, user_fullname, user_avatar FROM users WHERE user_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{query}, '%') ORDER BY user_fullname LIMIT 10
